page.title: 07Housing. Council Housing
page.content: Housing in Chepstow has increased considerably in the last few years. Recently a new housing development has been built in Chepstow down by the River Wye,thus encouraging the re-development of an old part of the town.The District Council had the flats built so that single people could rent the flats at a reasonable price.The site is set out in small very pleasant courts.The whole effect is very attractive.The flats have a fitted kitchen and a breakfast bar. The bedroom is small but quite adequate.The bathroom has,toilet,bath, sink.It also has a livingroom,little gardens and parking spaces.They are within easy reach of the town and other local facilities.
